Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Reroute at Jackson/Leamington
ShortDescription: 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Laramie, Harrison, Cicero and Jackson: due to, street blockage near Jackson/Leamington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Jackson, Laramie, Harrison, Cicero and Jackson, due to street blockage near Jackson/Leamington.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #29 State Temporary Southbound Reroute near Lafayette/83rd
ShortDescription: Southbound 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via Lafayette, 83rd, Holland, 87th and Lafayette: due to, street blockage near Lafayette/83rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via Lafayette, 83rd, Holland, 87th and Lafayette: due to, street blockage near Lafayette/83rd.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
